%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{cccc|c}
\hline 
\multicolumn{4}{c|}{Atributos} & \multirow{2}{*}{Classe}\tabularnewline
\cline{1-4} 
Livro & Abacate & ... & Zurzir & \tabularnewline
Receita Minuto & 1 & ... & 0 & Culinária\tabularnewline
Receita Segundo & 0 & ... & 0 & Culinária\tabularnewline
Receitas Reunidas & 1 & ... & 0 & Culinária\tabularnewline
Sagarana & 0 & ... & 1 & Romance\tabularnewline
Grande Sertão: Veredas & 0 & ... & 0 & Romance\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}
\end{document}
